sources.title: Undersea Kingdom (1936) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
Exclusive PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-Chapter Cliffhanger
Starring: C. Montague Shaw, Ray Corrigan, Lois Wilde, and Lon Chaney Jr.
Directed by:  B. Reeves Eason, Joseph Kane

A series of suspicious earthquakes send scientist Professor Norton on a submarine expedition to the bottom of the sea. Accompanying him are US Navy officer and All-Star athlete "Crash" Corrigan and courageous newspaper reporter Diana Compton.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï

1:25:57  CHAPTER 5: Prisoners of Atlantis
1:42:30  CHAPTER 6: The Juggernaut Strikes
1:58:10  CHAPTER 7: The Submarine Trap
2:14:28  CHAPTER 8: Into the Metal Tower
2:30:19  CHAPTER 9: Death in the Air 
2:46:08  CHAPTER 10: Atlantis Destroyed
3:02:37  CHAPTER 11: Flaming Death
3:21:01  CHAPTER 12: Ascent to the Upperworld
3:36:55 Please Subscribe!

sources.title: Undersea Kingdom¬†(1936)¬†Ray 'Crash' Corrigan | Sci-Fi,¬†Adventure¬†| 12 Episode Marathon
sources.description:
Crash Corrigan, a recent graduate of Annapolis, and Diana, a go-getting reporter, join Professor Norton for a search for the source of a string of earthquakes, Atlantis. They ride Prof. Norton's rocket submarine searching the sea and little Billy Norton, the professor's son stows away, of course. When they find Atlantis they are caught in a war between peaceful and war-mongering Atlantean citizens.

Directors:¬†B. Reeves Eason,¬†Joseph Kane

metadata.Plot: Crash Corrigan, a recent graduate of Annapolis, and Diana, a go-getting reporter, join Professor Norton for a search for the source of a string of earthquakes, Atlantis. They ride Prof. Norton's rocket submarine searching the sea and little Billy Norton, the professor's son stows away, of course. When they find Atlantis they are caught in a war between peaceful Atlanteans, note their white capes, and war-monging Atlanteans, note their black capes. After many harrowing moments for Crash, Diana, Prof. Norton and Billy, they barely get away with their lives when they escape a tower of Atlantis raised to the surface for the sole purpose of dominating or destroying the Earth (Which one depends on the compliance of the upper world dwellers.)
metadata.Writer: John Rathmell, Maurice Geraghty, Oliver Drake
metadata.Actors: Ray Corrigan, Lois Wilde, Monte Blue
